titles.title: Offshore Infrastructure Emergency Relief Act of 2005
Offshore Infrastructure Emergency Relief Act of 2005
To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to allow the area of a Presidentially declared disaster to include the outer Continental Shelf.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: Offshore Infrastructure Emergency Relief Act of 2005 - Amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to encompass the Outer Continental Shelf within the definition of "United States," thus authorizing its inclusion in presidentially declared disaster areas.
